text: @IvankaTrump Seriously?! Here you are trotting in here having a lovely day while so many ppl are ill, have died or are out of work, including ppl in my family, all because of your inept father's mishandling of COVID19! Talk about tone deaf! Read the room lady! All of you Trumps are awful ppl!
